original_text: The angel said to the other angels that stood in front of him, ‘Remove his very dirty clothes.’ Then the first angel said to Joshua, ‘See, I have taken away your sin. I will put the clothes on you that a priest should wear.’
korean_text: 여호와께서 자기 앞에 선 자들에게 명령하사 그 더러운 옷을 벗기라 하시고 또 여호수아에게 이르시되 내가 네 죄악을 제거하여 버렸으니 네게 아름다운 옷을 입히리라 하시기로

sentences.original_text: The angel said to the other angels
that stood in front of him
Then the first angel said to Joshua
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 첫 번째 천사가 여호수아에게 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: 'See, I have taken away your sin.'
I will put the clothes on you
